mapper.insert: insert into member (ID, M_CODE, PW, NAME, EMAIL, EMAIL_AGREE, SMS_AGREE, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, PHONE, BIRTH, SOL_LUN, INTRODUCE, COFFEE_FAVOR) values (#{param1},#{param2},#{param3},#{param4},#{param5},#{param6},#{param7},#{param8},#{param9},#{param10},#{param11},#{param12},#{param13},#{param14})
